definitions.definition: The medial line (or plane ) of the body , which divides the body into halves that are mirror-images of each other.
The level of the top of the x-height of a typeface .

main_definition: ( anatomy , medicine ) The medial line (or plane ) of the body , which divides the body into halves that are mirror-images of each other.
secondary_definitions: ( typography ) The level of the top of the x-height of a typeface .
